Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 23rd overall pick, by Gashouse in 1971...
Signed as a free agent by Columbus on 2/5/1983 to a 4-year deal worth $777,555 per year...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/7/1983, off Eddie Harris (TOL)...
Injured on 7/18/1983 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 4/9/1984 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
